thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 48 of 637
thread.title: Kim d Grindrod
thread.title_full: Fabletics reviewed by Kim d Grindrod

author: Kim d Grindrod
title: Kim d Grindrod
text: Been ordering for quite a while, for me, gifts, etc. Very pleased with products. The clothes are comfortable and stylish (receive many compliments). However, VERY disappointed that points expire after 12 months, especially because so many points are required for the items I desire. Recommend stopping that nonsense.
